ai-patthana17.18:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.18:0.3_0: body, speech, and mind have passed in the past,
ai-patthana17.18:1.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to the past, nor do those who are unskillful.
ai-patthana17.18:2.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a thought. Unwavering, the unskillful state doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana17.18:3.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t arise in the present, or unskillful objects.
